title: The Strange Madha-Nahwa Border
author: wheream_i
pages:
___________________

      The Strange
 Madha-Nahwa Border

     by wheream_i
___________________






This is a very small
region within the
greater United Arab
Emirates. Within it,
there is a small region
encompassing the town
of Madha and a small
range of mountains
that officially belongs
to Oman. But within that
small Omani region in
the UAE, there is an
even smaller region
called Nahwa that
belongs to the UAE. So
it is a tiny part of the
UAE that is entirely
surrounded by Oman,
which is also entirely
surrounded by the
UAE. Just a funny
thing to look at.
